description: This sleek black cylinder can be rotated clockwise to release the cold magic trapped within, soon detonating, blinding and freezing creatures in a small area.
A roll of pennies infused with an active agent of spreading. Upon activation it will shower an area in pennies, causing rapid changes to physiology in the area.

name: inanimate clay golem
description: A massive golem made of clay, waiting only to be awakened by your touch. Carefully, it may not quite understand what's happening.

use_action.friendly_msg: The clay golem rears it's ugly head, and smiles warmly at you.
use_action.hostile_msg: The clay golem's eyes slowly open, and you briefly see fear taking over.

name: inanimate plastic golem
description: A massive golem made of plastic, waiting only to be awakened by your touch. Carefully, it may not quite understand what's happening.

use_action.friendly_msg: The plastic golem looks abruptly up and slowly nods at your for it's next task.
use_action.hostile_msg: The plastic golem's eyes slowly open, and you see anger flood them.

description: A Western-style gun belt with a huge buckle emblazoned with a golden sun. It has a small divet for something in the star itself, and there's both a holster and a row of loops for spare ammo.
A cloak that truly breathes, yet hugs you perfectly. The gold and silver hands of the brooch that holds it are alight, praying for gifts from the silvermoon spirit.
An ethereal dumbell to be clutched in the buckle of a goldensun gunbelt which makes the wearer stronger.
An ethereal silk ribbon to be clutched in the brooch of a silvermoon cloak which makes the wearer more dextrous.
An ethereal spyglass to be clutched in the buckle of a goldensun gunbelt which makes the wearer more perceptive.
An ethereal eyeball to be clutched in the brooch of a silvermoon cloak which makes the wearer smarter.

A handheld device that looks something like a radio with a radar on it. The radar's screen is made of onyx and clicks occassionaly while activated. There's a big button you can push that will print a readout of the information, which you will need to scan for abnormalities.

name: Printout
description: Your anomaly detector prints out a page of raw data.
A readout of all anomalies in your area.

use_action.message: You note down the location of some nearby anomalies.

description: A mesh of string and weights, traditionally used to catch fish and to entangle opponents in combat.
A small mesh bag that seems to continuously fill with nets while you're wearing it. Don't worry, they're not that useful.
A little scrap of paper that is whirring and flashing with lights like a Las Vegas casino. On the front is a grinning wizard who winks at you and advertises the location of his 'Wondeful Forge.'

use_action.message: You note down the location of nearby Forges.

name: Cooling Breeze
description: Projects a light puff of cold air.

name: Cooling Breeze
description: Projects a light puff of cold air.

name.str: handheld automatic magical temperature regulator - cold

description: A little plastic fan that looks much like a toy. Right now it's giving off puffs of cool air, but it can be cycled to give off warm air or turned off completely.

use_action.msg: You turn the heat up.

name.str: handheld automatic magical temperature regulator - hot

description: A little plastic fan that looks much like a toy. Right now it's giving off puffs of hot air, but it can be cycled to give off cool air or turned off completely.

use_action.msg: You turn the fan off.

name.str: handheld automatic magical temperature regulator - off

description: A little plastic fan that looks much like a toy. Right now it's off, but it can be cycled to give off cool or hot air.

use_action.msg: You turn the fan on.

effect.u_message: As the cold embrace of death touches your heart, you sink into a state of unconsciousness. All is blank for some unknowable amount of time, and then all of a sudden a great flash of light pierces your vision. The Philosopher's Stone around your neck shatters and it's life is instilled within you! A bouquet of flowers falls to mark your passing.

description: The Fountain of Youth. The Holy Grail. Even they pale in comparison to this most holy of objects, for the divinity rests entirely within itself. The wearer is said to be blessed by the powers that be, a true demi-god.
Wearing the professional homeowner's belt makes crafting anything quicker by a country mile. Nothing beats Alchemy, but this belt comes close.

A semi-dimensional belt with pockets, loops and sheaths to store up to six tools or blades. It also comes equipped with several useful tools, such as a chemistry set, a distillery, and a state of the art magical altar. It may also aid in the creation of homemade explosives, acids, or booby traps if one is so inclined.

A pen carved into a shape suitable for throwing at a target, with a tip of crystallized mana that guides it.  It's not a boomerang, so don't expect it to return to your hand, but when it hits it packs a punch.

Probably the most impactful invention of the 21st century. A small metal cylinder that contains the magically shrunken versions of everything needed to install CBMs. This invention led to 'home chipping,' a practice both effective and consequential.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.
A small metal cylinder that was recently contained within a larger cylinder. This cylinder contains the computer portion of an autodoc, you think.
A small metal cylinder that was recently contained within a larger cylinder. This cylinder contains the couch portion of an autodoc, you think.

name: Conjure Autodoc Computer
description: Computerator

name: Conjure Autodoc Couch
description: Couchinator

furniture.message: There's a rippling in the air and a blast of cold air, then the computer portion of the autodoc forms.
There's a rippling in the air and a blast of cold air, then the couch portion of the autodoc forms.

description: A small cardboard box with a small muscular arm sticking out of it's lid. The arm holds a roll of duct tape which never seems to run out.
name: REAL Man's Toolbox
Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

Originally a project instituted by X.E.D.R.A, this silencer quickly fell into the commercial realm for it's extreme practicality. Simply put, it reduces firearm noise to absolute zero at the cost of ~15 feet of range. Made of brittle crystallized mana, it isn't built to last long, but some say the inventors found a way to work around this. Maybe you could too.

An advanced form of the silvermoon muzzle which does not break from usage. It muzzles the firearm entirely at the cost of a small amount of range. Attaches the barrel in the form of a white wolf's head.

Originally a project instituted by X.E.D.R.A, this muzzle brake quickly fell into the commercial realm for it's extreme practicality. It increases the range of the firearm by ~250 feet, in exchange for more firearm noise. Made of brittle crystallized mana, it isn't built to last long, but some say the inventors found a way to work around this. Maybe you could too.

An advanced form of the goldensun claw which does not break from usage. It increases range and handling greatly, while making the firearm bark with every shot. It attaches to the barrel in the form of a black wolf's head.

Useful for carrying money, documents, or smuggled goods. This particular briefcase has a trick bottom that shines with a golden light when you open it. That light calls you to it, but you shut the case.
A military grade device used to make the world a darker place, and to operate more efficiently in it. You get the feeling something is watching you, for some unknown reason.
A shiny golden fiddle, with a strange aura around it.  You feel like it once belonged to the best there's ever been. Now it belongs to you.

player_descriptions: You play a quick, folksy tune on your fiddle.
As you pull the bow across its strings, it makes an evil hiss.
You play a tune so fierce, it feels like hell's broke loose.

description: The skull of a human being.  Carrying this around probably isn't going to win you any friends.

A military grade device used to peer into a mind and take it's secrets. Highly unethical and illegal, but also highly effective. Looks somewhat like a mask, but with hundreds of 'branches' shooting out in all directions. When a skull is inserted and the device is activated, these branches pierce it and the 'mouth' of the mask begins printing data.
A laptop computer that would run forever, if you wanted it to.

use_action.msg: You light up the screen.
You stop lighting up the screen.

description: This is just the thing to knead the tension out and help you relax.  Use it to take a break and unwind.
A tablet PC using an efficient color e-ink display.  Before the Cataclysm, these were nifty gadgets; now, it's an almost priceless resource.  Never runs out of juice.

use_action.msg: You power up the screen.
You power down the screen.

//: LIGHT_10 is the bare minimum for reading without penalties

description: A point-and-shoot digital camera, with digital viewfinder, a backup 'iron-sight', and flash.  You can look at your photos on the digital screen, or transfer them with a memory card.

A 35mm digital SLR (single-lens reflex) camera, with optical and digital viewfinders, zoom lens with auto-focus and stabilizer, and flash.  You can view your photos on it or transfer them with a memory card.  Before the Cataclysm, you could have taken professional-grade photos using this.
A smartphone that was advertised to never stop working, even underwater. What they didn't advertise was it's bulky design and lack of ability to play music.

use_action.msg: You activate the flashlight app.
You deactivate the flashlight app.

description: A thin and light pair of socks made of nomex that magically reduce the sound you make while wearing them.
A marker to be placed anywhere one might wish to return.
A stone what may spirit the user back to Gran Soren, else the location of a portcrystal, in an instant.
A small glass flask filled with blue and white liquid. When ingested, the drinker will 'burp up' a translocation circle.
A small glass flask filled with blue and white liquid. When ingested, the drinker will 'burp up' something that teaches spells ( such as a scroll ) over the course of the next minute.

A small glass flask filled with a liquid that is absolutely roaring with color. You haven't seen most of them before, but somehow you know that if you drink this a creature of great power and opportunity will be called.
A gory poppet of death and life alike. If consumed, this 'creature' would take your place in the arms of Death, should it come for you within the next few minutes.

name: Drank a Buncha Bleach
desc: Did you really do that? Holy shit. I cannot believe that worked.

description: A handful of change with the mutating elements bleached out of them, you hope. Probably won't be fun, but it should kill anything squirming around in your stomach, at least.
A small glass flask filled with a swirling green liquid. You've heard of this stuff, and what it does to you. Mutations abound when it's around.
A glass bottle filled with a thick gas that, reportedly, will cause you to 'burp up' a semi-truck if ingested.
A glass bottle filled with a deliciously blue liquid that, reportedly, will cause you to 'burp up' a large ship if ingested.
A glass bottle filled with a wild blue flame that, reportedly, will cause you to 'burp up' a magically powered motorcycle if ingested.
A glass bottle filled with a cool green kaleidoscope that, reportedly, will cause you to 'burp up' a magically powered motorcycle if ingested.

A magical wrist mounted 'watch' that has a plethora of features. When questioned why you cannot play music through it, the spokesman said 'Well the boys in development tell me that magic and music just do. not. mix!' He was soon fired.

use_action.message: You add terrain and roads to your map.

use_action.msg: You light up the screen.

description: A magical wrist mounted 'watch' that has a plethora of features. When questioned why you cannot play music through it, the spokesman said 'Well the boys in development tell me that magic and music just do. not. mix!' He was soon fired.

use_action.message: You add terrain and roads to your map.

use_action.msg: You stop lighting up the screen.

name: Sorcery Pre-Order Pack
description: What appears to be a regular pack of 'Sorcery' cards is actually a promo pack with a limited edition, one in a million collector's item magically sealed inside.

A BIG medieval crossbow, which can be loaded with up to three bolts at a time. Its tension is so powerful that the guy who helps you pull back the string almost gets thrown off. Why not let him show you it's features?
//: 800 lbs, 40in steel limbs, 0.41 Slugs with a 30g bolt, 2.0 slugs with a special 0.5 lb bolt

description: A dark mask worn by the Eastern Warrior. Wearing it makes you supremely fast, and you could activate it to become even faster.
A long, thin sword made of pearlescent metal. The wielder was a swordsman of only one equal.
A set of fancy golden bracelets that are worn around either arm, warm to the touch and faintly glowing with light. Activate them to call down flames from the sky.
A small orb of cool light that forms to the pommel of a blade, magically attaching it to your back. Activate it to gaze into the orb and gain insight...

use_action.holster_msg: The orb settles unto your blade, magically attaching it to your back.

description: A smooth metallic disc that things are almost magnetically attracted to. Can be switched to be carried on the back instead. Sometimes it psychically complains about not containing anything. Odd and ignorable.

use_action.msg: You move the pebble to your back.

description: A smooth metallic disc that objects are almost magnetically attracted to. Can be switched to be carried on the hip instead. Sometimes it psychically complains about not containing anything. Odd and ignorable.

use_action.msg: You move the pebble to your waist.

description: The twinned hands of the legendary Siamese archers guide you to heights unknown by any mortal.
With their souls united, the full power of Lars and Ersen can be unleashed.
//: 120 lb draw weight, very efficient, 0.5 slugs of momentum with a 30g arrow.

name: teddy bear
description: An old and half rotten teddy bear. Looks like this one used to commemorate the grave of the child who once owned it. If it had a soul, who knows what power it might hold over children? Just a thought.

//: That's about the midpoint for a rolex.
description: A rather large and expensively-made wristwatch with multiple time displays, magically enhanced to make you invincible for a short period of time. As with almost every corporate-made magic product, they failed to advertise the fact that the stasis applied locks you in place for nearly 5 minutes, or that it was powered by the souls of those who cannot pass into death. There's also a 'feature' wherein if a dollar bill gets too close, the watch will swallow it whole. The wearer is able to withdraw the cash at any time, but most customers were dissatisfied with it's implementation. It's really the only timepiece suitable for someone of your exquisitely discerning tastes.
An immaculate 'wand' of deep red and purple wood that can and has been used to rain death and destruction.

A small box filled with wigs, make-up, and so such that could be used to fake someone's identity. If used on a person who still has some life left in them, it might fool someone into thinking you're already dead. If that mattered.

effect.u_message: As the curtains close, you take your final bow. Ohp, wait, production's calling you in for one last take. Gonna need a smoke for this one...

description: A small, simple device used to play VHS tapes, if you can find one. You have the urge to put in money in the hopes that something cool comes out.
You're not sure if this thing is really here or if you're just seeing it. It feels so familiar, like you've already looked for so long. You feel that there must be some way to bring it to life...
An apparatus renowned amongst wizards for ages. Taking time to gaze deep into it allows you to see places far, far away...
An apparatus renowned amongst wizards for ages. Though you must take it for a fool, since you've covered it with a cloak.

A pair of shaded glasses that have a second crystal lens over the first, providing a series of benefits. A nodule on the stem allows the wearer to temporarily blind themselves in exchange for vision of unknown territory.

use_action.msg: You stop lighting up the screen.

description: A pair of shaded glasses that have a second magical lens over the first, providing a series of benefits. A nodule on the stem allows the wearer to temporarily blind themselves in exchange for vision of unknown territory.

use_action.msg: You light up the screen.

description: A wig of salt and pepper hair that when worn provides the user with a great deal of personal importance. It was marketed as the next big thing in fashion, but was quickly disregarded by the community as being pointless. The more socially-resistant among the people were still known to rock one.

An all in one badge for your every office need, this badge makes sure you get to work on time! Made of our patented meta-absorbant material, never worry about a spill or stain again! And forget about pesky fires, the stored messes can be used as an extinguishing agent in any emergency. Crystallizedmananotincludedallstandardtermsandconditionsapply. Get the Professional's Pendant for your office, today!

A temporary ID that was used by professionals so that guests could keep up pace. Simply put it on, and you're able to teleport to translocators. Undo it's clasp to take it off, leaving you with a normal ID badge. Some customers report a side effect of temporarily swapping bodies as well as dislocating realities from those around them, but these accusations are buggy at best. Nothing a little sleep won't fix.

use_action.msg: You feel the magic leave the pass as you undo it's clasp.

description: A small cardboard box inscribed with the ever-recognizable Foodplace's delicious food™ logo, which can be activated to become filled with Foodplace's delicious food™. And as a special bonus, every 7 (or so) purchases we'll reward you with cash back! Requires a foodplace loyalty card in order to be used. Additionally, Loyalty members can use the box to order from the 'After Hours' Loyalty Catalogue.
name: Foodplace's Magical Subscription Box™
Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.
A large canvas sack that rejects the presence of anything other than rocks.

This is a fountain pen that writes solely in the language of magic, meaning anything you try to write with it is invisible. It's useful for artisticly weaving magic into things, or if you had some white ink you could construct a magic circle.
This is a fine fountain pen with a giant squid etched into the back, pushing down each of the tentacles switches to a different color. It also never runs out of ink, unlike a normal fountain pen.

use_action.msg: You click the pen.

description: This is a fine fountain pen with a giant squid etched into the back, pushing down each of the tentacles switches to a different color. It also never runs out of ink, unlike a normal fountain pen.

use_action.msg: You click the pen.

description: This is a fine fountain pen with a giant squid etched into the back, pushing down each of the tentacles switches to a different color. It also never runs out of ink, unlike a normal fountain pen.

use_action.msg: You click the pen.

description: This is a fine fountain pen with a giant squid etched into the back, pushing down each of the tentacles switches to a different color. It also never runs out of ink, unlike a normal fountain pen.

use_action.msg: You click the pen.

description: A dingy, normal looking house key that reflects a tad too much light, and in it you catch fleeting glimpses of reflected doors only somewhat nostalgic to you. While holding it you also know how many steps you've taken and how to open any lock.
A small miniature of a cleric, such as would be used for tabletop gaming. Activating it may awaken someone.

use_action.summon_msg: The miniature expands into a fully grown cleric!

description: A small miniature of a wizard, such as would be used for tabletop gaming. Activating it may awaken someone.

use_action.summon_msg: The miniature expands into a fully grown wizard!

description: A small miniature of a fighter, such as would be used for tabletop gaming. Activating it may awaken someone.

use_action.summon_msg: The miniature expands into a fully grown fighter!

description: A small miniature of a rogue, such as would be used for tabletop gaming. Activating it may awaken someone.

use_action.summon_msg: The miniature expands into a fully grown rogue!

description: A small miniature of a druid, such as would be used for tabletop gaming. Activating it may awaken someone.

use_action.summon_msg: The miniature expands into a fully grown druid!

description: An alcoholic drink mixed with crystallized mana. Drinking it will slow your movement to a crawl while kicking your spellcasting ability into overdrive.
Your mind kicks into high gear and magic replaces your body. Casting spells is much faster but walking is harder. The high noon sun seems to gleam in a Wizard's Eagle Eye.
Your ability to cast spells is unmatched.

name: On the Rocks
description: creates an alcoholic aura

name: On the Rocks
description: creates an alcoholic aura

effect.u_message: Your hands start shaking… you need it bad!

name: Crystallized Mana Withdrawal
description: Strength - 1;   Slight sluggishness;   Occasional cravings
Some crystallized mana, crushed into a powder. Not quite as elegant as mana dust. Ingested it injects mana straight into the bloodstream, overusage causes tiredness and is somewhat addictive.
A dark black box that only seems large enough to hold a small bird, but you could fit just about anybody in there.
A piece of paper that has been magically enhanced to have the property of containment. Small objects or creatures can be stored inside. Most commonly used by mages to store magic circles.

name: parabolan silk undersuit
description: A lithe half-body undersuit made of parabolan silk, an adaptation of parabolan wool that shows reflections of things that could never be. When the wearer is harmed they will suddenly find themself somewhere else.

The Foodplace Obesity Obstruction Device™ was a last minute attempt by Foodplace to save face. Essentially a normal water bottle that can only hold water, it was handed out as an apology to Loyalty customers who had been declared morbidly obese. They went to the trouble of making it hold near-infinite water, at least.

A (somehow and for some reason) Hawaiian-themed bottle of air freshener is actually a cleverly disguised fire extinguisher that will douse flames at will. Can't help with a rash, but it might save you from an arson investigation.
The spray bottle douses you.
A huge watertight 'bag' made of stretched plastic. It has been enchanted to hold more than it should, but objects inside weigh more.

A cheap plastic cup with the Foodplace logo that Loyalty customers used to be able to purchase for points, which they could use to spend more points. Along with being a priceless collectible, it keeps your drink cold forever.

name: Delivery!
description: Suddenly, your life has meaning again.

A lightweight, bullet resistant vest made to block damage from heat. Most magical forms of damage can be resisted if the vest is attuned to do so. Suitable for wearing under clothing. Highly recommended for any field operator of a magical nature.

use_action.msg: You attune the mantle to block cold damage.

description: A lightweight, bullet resistant vest made to block damage from cold. Most magical forms of damage can be resisted if the vest is attuned to do so. Suitable for wearing under clothing. Highly recommended for any field operator of a magical nature.

use_action.msg: You attune the mantle to block electric damage.

description: A lightweight, bullet resistant vest made to block damage from electricity. Most magical forms of damage can be resisted if the vest is attuned to do so. Suitable for wearing under clothing. Highly recommended for any field operator of a magical nature.

use_action.msg: You attune the mantle to block acid damage.

description: A lightweight, bullet resistant vest made to block damage from acid. Most magical forms of damage can be resisted if the vest is attuned to do so. Suitable for wearing under clothing. Highly recommended for any field operator of a magical nature.

use_action.msg: You attune the mantle to block biological damage.

description: A lightweight, bullet resistant vest made to block biological damage. Most magical forms of damage can be resisted if the vest is attuned to do so. Suitable for wearing under clothing. Highly recommended for any field operator of a magical nature.

use_action.msg: You attune the mantle to block heat damage.

description: A ring of a polished dull-grey metal with an intricate and technologically superior design woven into it, that when properly manipulated allow it to change shape and function. The wearer deals more ballistic damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of physical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with stabbing.

description: A ring of a polished dull-grey metal with an intricate and technologically superior design woven into it, that when properly manipulated allow it to change shape and function. The wearer deals more ballistic damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of physical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with cutting.

description: A ring of a polished dull-grey metal with an intricate and technologically superior design woven into it, that when properly manipulated allow it to change shape and function. The wearer deals more ballistic damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of physical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with ballistics.

description: A ring of a polished dull-grey metal with an intricate and technologically superior design woven into it, that when properly manipulated allow it to change shape and function. The wearer deals more ballistic damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of physical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with bashing.

description: A ring of cold ice that never melts, said to have been used by the white wolf himself. The wearer deals more heat damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of magical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with freezing.

description: A ring of cold ice that never melts, said to have been used by the white wolf himself. The wearer deals more cold damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of magical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with sparking.

description: A ring of cold ice that never melts, said to have been used by the white wolf himself. The wearer deals more electric damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of magical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with melting.

description: A ring of cold ice that never melts, said to have been used by the white wolf himself. The wearer deals more acid damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of magical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with draining.

description: A ring of cold ice that never melts, said to have been used by the white wolf himself. The wearer deals more biological damage. It can be attuned to assist with different kinds of magical combat.

use_action.msg: You attune the ring to assist with burning.

name: Snort Mana
description: You snort crystallized mana, much the same as coke but not quite as magical.

name: Crystal Sickness
description: Snorting crystal leaves you weary for the day.
A profoundly addictive and powerful stimulant. Magicians find it extremely useful for enhancing combat abilities, as well as a renowned ability to tire them out.

name: Crack Magic
description: Meth aura
You feel more magically attuned now that you've had your morning meth.
A profoundly addictive and powerful stimulant. Magicians find it extremely useful for enhancing combat abilities, as well as a renowned ability to tire them out.

name: Crack Magic
description: Meth aura
You feel more magically attuned now that you've had your morning meth.

An extremely potent substance made from heroin mixed with crystallized mana. Injection leads to an incredibly heightened reading comprehension, as well as extreme fragility of the body. Experts believed this to be related to non-locality, but they couldn't find the missing link.

name: yourself into yourself and sinks you into a state of comprehending bliss
description: Fast reader aura

name: yourself into yourself and sinks you into a state of comprehending bliss
description: Fast reader aura
You feel as though symbols have more meaning, and time seems to dilate as you look at them.
A twist of the herb wrapped in tobaccy, perfect for a relaxing evening.
A twist of the herb wrapped in tobaccy, perfect for a relaxing evening.
The ultimate arrow, said to kill instantly.
A blunt that has been sanctimoniously re-rolled to painstakingly remove the harmful toxins within and replace them with only the most pure of ingredients. It is quite literally glowing.

name: coffee manamization
description: Recovers mana
An aromatic brew, sprinkled with crystallized mana as if it were sugar. Brings the mind to focus on the essence of magic.

name: crystallized coffee manamization
description: Recovers mana

name: Recover mana
description: Recovers mana
Your mind feels invigorated by your morning joe.
Your mind is bursting with energy.
You know how to make your suit disappear.
A twist of the herb wrapped in tobaccy, perfect for a relaxing evening.

use_action.activation_message: You smoke your crack rocks.  Mother would be proud.

name: Magic of Crack
desc: You can't trust everything that you see.

name: Magic of LSD
desc: You can't trust everything that you see.

name: Magic of Morphine
desc: You can't trust everything that you see.

use_action.activation_message: You take a dab of some wax.  *cough cough* good stuff!
You take a dab of some distillate.  Sooooo smooth…

name: Adderall Magic
desc: You can't trust everything that you see.

name: High Magic
desc: You can't trust everything that you see.

name: High Magic
desc: You can't trust everything that you see.

use_action.activation_message: You smoke some weed.  Good stuff, man!

description: Any moron who can crush up white powder can put together a pair of 'grandpa's contacts,' which can be placed in the eye to see even in the darkest of bedrooms. People tried to market these throughout the years but they're just too easy to make, fade far too quickly, and hurt the eyes a little too much.

What appears at first to be a shovel, grown over with weeds and covered in dirt, is actually a living breathing creature. The shovels head now splits like a mouth and the hilt writhes at a touch, the 'head' snapping at whatever comes close, eyes perpetually closed like a newborn infant.

use_action.done_message: Your shovely lithely rips a huge chunk of dirt out of the earth, swallowing it whole. Where it goes, no one knows, but the shovel seems happy.

description: A long, thin sword made of pearlescent metal. The wielder was a swordsman of only one equal,

effect.u_message: As your life force drifts away, you are overcome with a sense of peace. You have served this world well, and it thanks you with a sweet Death. As the last light fades from your eyes, they fall on the symbol around your neck. Perhaps there's some life left in you after all...

description: A simple necklace representing a religious faith.
